sqls.sql: select id, name, icon from t_coupon_kind where status = 0 order by position
select id as id, name as title, info as info, image as image from t_credit_coupon where home_kind = 'coupons' and status = 0
select id as id, name as title, info as info, image as image from t_credit_coupon where home_kind = 'markets' and status = 0

select coupon.id as id, coupon.name as cardName, coupon.info as cardTxt, coupon.image as cardImg, coupon.coupon_desc as details, if(store.id, true, false) as isStar from t_credit_coupon coupon left join t_store store on store.path = concat('#/service/specials/detail/', coupon.id) where coupon.id = :id and coupon.status = 0
select 0 as id, '全部优惠' as name from t_coupon_kind union select id, name from t_coupon_kind where status = 0
select 0 as id, '全部银行' as name from t_bank union select id, name from t_bank where status = 0
select id as id, name as title, info as info, image as image from t_credit_coupon where status = 0
select id from t_store where user_id = :userId and kind = :kind and path = :path and status = 0
insert into t_store(user_id, name, kind, path, create_time, status) select :userId, name, :kind, :path, now(), 0 from t_credit_coupon where id = :id and status = 0
delete from t_store where user_id = :userId and kind = :kind and path = :path and status = 0
